column5: You will get a introduction about extendable functionalities of the OTRS ticket system
column6: ITSM Module: a package bundle for IT-Service-Managemanet
column7:
You as the Agent
-The company now makes use of a installed base for services. The CMDB can accessed within the agent interface.
- Manually create new Config Items 'IntelliEye' with Production State 'active''.

You as the Customer
- Create a new process 'IntelliEyes::Termination of a Service'

You as the Agent
- Login with the IntelliEyes Agent and close the ticket.
- Check the production state of the CI.
- Login with the admin agent

- Go the packet manager within the admin area
Visit https://opar.perl-services.de/package/download/1440, get the OPM paket and install. Check out the new feature witin a ticket. Look for 'Checklist' inside the ticket menu bar'

You can now finish the Demo-OTRS.
column9: opm packet paket checklist extension addon itsm management config item
